properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 12:53AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
At 1252 AM EST...a strong thunderstorm was near Turtle Cove, or near
Monticello...moving northeast at 30 mph.

HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind...frequent cloud to ground lightning
and heavy rain.

IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of
light...unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary
street flooding especially in poor drainage areas.

Some locations in the path of this storm include
Madison, Monticello, Newborn, Shady Dale, Buckhead, Turtle Cove,
Harmony, Godfrey, Rock Eagle 4-H Center, Central Georgia Experiment
Stn, Calvin, Farrar, Eudora, North Alcovy and McElheneys Crossroads.
properties.instruction:
People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear
thunder...you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists
should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to
hydroplaning.

LAT...LON 3322 8378 3338 8390 3369 8342 3342 8327
TIME...MOT...LOC 0552Z 240DEG 25KT 3334 8378

WIND...40MPH

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR EASTERN BUTTS...SOUTHERN MORGAN...NORTHWESTERN PUTNAM...JASPER AND SOUTHEASTERN NEWTON COUNTIES UNTIL 145 AM EST
